III (Three).translatedComment: The 2021 third anniversary stout from Spartacus, Brazilâ€™s number one winery, is the best dessert stout I have ever tasted! The first bite was amazing! Aged in two bourbon barrels, the wine is medium-bodied and not thick when poured into the glass. The first bite is like eating ice cream. The sweetness in your mouth grabs you. The wine is super smooth and slides down your throat involuntarily. It starts to return to your throat, giving you a rich flavor experience of toasted coconut, cinnamon, coffee, black chocolate, etc. Itâ€™s a special surprise, especially when you donâ€™t pay much attention, itâ€™s super refreshing! Some wine friends have the same feeling as Uncle Hong, the perfect fusion of barrel and wine! Full marks to Uncle Hong! 2023.5.14 Open the can and drink

III (Three).translatedComment: Deep black, no foam, coconut oil solids precipitated on the surface float. The wine is medium to medium-bodied and has an incredible viscosity. It is also very smooth and has the taste of a top-notch stout. The aroma is slightly weak, nutty, slightly maple syrup, obviously sweet. The front part is sweet, with maple syrup and toasted coconut, and the back part is a little spicy, with a cinnamon feeling on the tip of the tongue. After warming up, there are obvious aromas of maple sugar and toasted coconut. The bitterness brought by the barrel flavor in the later stage, and the aroma of cinnamon becomes more intense. Overall, the body of the wine is very good, it can be called top-notch, and the performance and balance of maple syrup are also very good. The weakness is that the initial aroma is not attractive enough and needs to be warmed up, and the barrel flavor is relatively weak.

III (Three).comment: Eerste 5/5. En dat op mijn verjaardag! Maar ja was ook gewoon perfect
III (Three).translatedComment: First 5/5. And that on my birthday! But yes, it was also just perfect

III (Three).translatedComment: The last wine of 2021 has established that Spartacus is my favorite winery in 2021. As soon as I opened the bottle and took it out, the 15-degree wine tasted like 10 degrees, and the alcohol was suppressed to the point where it was almost non-existent. It has the texture of a dessert stout but is not greasy at all. After the coconut hazelnut warms up for fifteen minutes, the flavor changes and turns into maple syrup and cinnamon. The bitterness begins to emerge, but the alcohol is still very stable. Considering the price, 4.75 is not an exaggeration, itâ€™s awesome!

The fourth anniversary stout of Brazil's No. 1 winery Spartacus in 2022. These two wines are the wines in Uncle Hong's treasure. They are also reserved for the 5th anniversary and are on the way back. If there is a chance, Uncle Hong will make this wine again. The drinking buddies from the bureau were invited back to taste the 5th anniversary together. This 4th anniversary version also contains Ethiopian Geisha coffee. The entrance is also naturally smooth, and the smoothness passes through your taste buds and is drank through the throat. It will be stronger in the roasted coconut flavor than the previous one, more of a dessert stout. Geisha coffee may bring a slight acidity, but It's not obvious. It's still sweet but not greasy overall. The barrel and the wine blend perfectly together! Maybe the previous one was too amazing, so this one didnâ€™t get full marks. 2023.5.14 Open the can and drink
DLD!

Cookie de Chocolate.translatedComment: Even if the side of the cup is down, you can still get a coffee caramel color, dense and very delicious, beautiful and long-lasting head (foam). I took three sips when it was about to overflow. I must try to smell the coffee, chocolate, vanilla and The sweet taste is smooth, delicate and thick. The body of the wine is interesting but not so thick or thick. This is what I like. Compared with some totes, it is not so greasy. It is suitable for all-you-can-drink meals. The taste is a good blend of chocolate and coffee, and the bitterness and alcohol are relatively low. The body is very balanced, the taste is not changeable (not many layers) but the coffee chocolate is stable and continues to be weak (output). The aroma is also very sufficient and cleans the mouth (even has a sweet aftertaste). The small coffee chocolate is not bitter and refreshing, but it feels very powerful when it is in place. /b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Was maar beetje, en hij stond al even open. Maar daar merk je weinig van! Heerlijk zacht dik spul. Mooie chocolade en koffie. De vanille uit de bourbon is subtiel maar zeker aanwezig.

/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.comment: Boterzacht van smaak, heel veel bourbon, zoethout en bourbon. Bourbon in het kwadraat. De smaak blijft heerlijk hangen en zo sterk van smaak. Bourbon zaligheid. Heel dik van smaak.
/b/spartacus-brewing-arete-tomo-4/494730.translatedComment: Buttery soft in taste, lots of bourbon, licorice and bourbon. Bourbon squared. The taste lingers wonderfully and is so strong. Bourbon bliss. Very thick in taste.
